name: Ormsfield
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect common; Coastal influences minimal
harvest and star-calendar festivals shape year
simple cuisine: flatbreads, salted cheese, preserved herbs
deferential customs toward manor and elder council
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
limited combustion industry; no steam megatechs
notes: near-medieval tech with localized ritual practices
ford + small ferry ties Ormsfield into a regional lane
